p: Our results shown in Figure 2A are in concurrence with previous work by Naeem et al. [ 48], who found that application of PMO acting as a semi-permeable coating around the samplesâ€™ surfaces resulting in a reduction of vitamin C loss. The reduction in vitamin C loss by EOs application could be explained by the antioxidant properties of EOs resulting in a reduction in oxygen diffusion and respiration rate [ 52].
